title: Program Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Theodore Roosevelt Conservation Partnership (Washington, DC) in Sept 2021
Interview Descriptions: There were two interviews, both virtual, that included several team members. Everyone was extremely nice and eager to find someone that was the right fit. The questions were mostly just to have me elaborate on my resume and talk about how those experiences could apply to the position. Solid experience overall.
Interview Questions: Tell us about your policy and campaign experience

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Theodore Roosevelt Conservation Partnership in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was efficient and effective. They got back to me quickly and were nice throughout.  The questions were not difficult and the interviewers were easy to talk to. Seems like a great organization.
Interview Questions: What do you know about fishing and hunting?
